name: Arceon
storyline: For a few decades, the Arceon asteroid, that orbits near a giant star has been home to a mining and more importantly a secret research station. While the exact nature of the experiments done in the station remains a secret, one of the recent findings not only resulted in a catastrophic invasion that has overrun most of the facilities, but also has changed the course of the asteroid which is now speeding towards the giant star where it will crash disintegrating Arceon and all of it's facilities As one of the few survivors of the invasion, you must find your way thru Arceon and escape the asteroid into the escape ships that managed to escape the station.
summary:
Arceon is a boom compatible mapset consisting of 6 medium length maps plus an epilogue map, mainly consisting of techbase themed maps, with different themes based on the light color of each map

Each of the maps was built with an emphasis on having layouts that encourage incidental combat from monsters and are easy to navigate, filled along with several combat setpieces.
